_Info: This is the JSON based Configuration for BinMenu
AddItems Are your items not in the base that you
Want added to the menu for you every time.

Setup._ScriptBase: [string] The starting folder that BinMenu reads from.
Setup._Base: [string] The base folder containing all your PS1 scripts.
Setup._Editor: [string] Defines a text editor to use from BinMenu
Setup._MenuAdds: [bool] Determines if the menu adds are used or not
Setup._Notify: [bool] Determines if Notifications are sent using asay/notify
Setup._WPosition: [bool] Turns both inner and outer script console window positioning 1-on or 0-off.
Setup._WinHeight: [int] How tall to draw the inner window.
Setup._WinWidth: [int] How wide to draw the inner window.
Setup._WinX: [int] Position from the LEFT of the actual outer window. Use to position window on screen
Setup._WinY: [int] Position from the TOP of the actual outer window. Use to position window on screen
Setup._WinSMX: [int] Position from the LEFT of the Settings Manager outer window. Use to position window on screen
Setup._WinSMY: [int] Position from the TOP of the Settings Manager outer window. Use to position window on screen
Setup._WinSX: [int] Position from the LEFT of the actual outer SCRIPTS window. (E option - BinScript.ps1)
Setup._WinSY: [int] Position from the TOP of the actual outer SCRIPTS window. (E option - BinScript.ps1)
